shows.title: Big Sing
shows.desc:
An annual vocal extravaganza for all who believe they can sing/can't sing/ won't sing and any who are fed up with the church praise band doing its own upbeat versions of Be Thou My Vision and How Great Thou Art.

The WGRG is a semi-autonomous project of the Iona Community, equipping congregations and clergy in the creation of new forms of worship.
